review:
A good story. Even they made mistake in their adult stage, they are caring each other. The boy ready do any hard work to make his girl happy with lot of love. And the girl also understanding his efforts and giving support in her own way. Both are loving very much their baby and taking care each other.

2. Cylinder delivery
3. Selling fruits
4. Good friends
5. Good character parent of the boy
6. At any risk trying to bring the medicines for her

A good story. Even they made mistake in their adult stage, they are caring each other. The boy ready do any hard work to make his girl happy with lot of love. And the girl also understanding his efforts and giving support in her own way. Both are loving very much their baby and taking care each other. 
       
1. Construction work
2. Cylinder delivery
3. Selling fruits
4. Good friends
5. Good character parent of the boy
6. At any risk trying to bring the medicines for her

Such a good things I observed in this film.

Really nice film to watch.

And finally I love the small cute baby.....

This movie is a guidance for the young generation that carrier growth, self-dependency & parents trust are more important than any stranger's love . They have also shown the consequences of falling in love. I truly appreciate it.
